Not enough games available for meaningfu: 沒有足夠的遊戲場次，以至於無法提供有效的對戰數據。
Percent of first place players at each t: Percent of first place players at each tavern tier by turn
This hero does not have a playable hero: This hero does not have a playable hero power.
This hero's ranking when sorting all her: This hero's ranking when sorting all heroes by their average placement. Lower is better.
The placement at the end of a game this: The placement at the end of a game this hero achieves on average. Lower is better.
Percent of the time this hero is picked: Percent of the time this hero is picked at the start of a game when presented as an option.
Percent of first place players that used: Percent of first place players that used their Hero Power at a given turn
Percent of first place players at each t: Percent of first place players at each tavern tier, by turn
Detailed statistics about all minion, fo: Detailed statistics about all minion, for the selected hero, tier, turn and composition.
Search: e.g. Rat Pack, Mama Bear: Search: e.g. Rat Pack, Mama Bear
Percent of the time {minion} is purchase: Percent of the time {minion} is purchased, when available, while having no copies of {minion} in play.
Percent of the time {minion} is purchased, when available, while having one copy of {minion} in play.
Percent of the time {minion} is purchased, when available, while having two copies of {minion} in play. Triples!
Each row represents a spot on the board. The height of each bar indicates how commonly {minion} is placed in that spot on the board.
The average impact a non-golden {minion}: The average impact a non-golden {minion} on the board has on winning the combat round.
The average impact a golden {minion} on: The average impact a golden {minion} on the board has on winning the combat round.
Percent of the time {minion} has been gi: Percent of the time {minion} has been given Taunt at this point in the game.
Most players tavern up for <0>{gold} gol: Most players tavern up for <0>{gold} gold</0>
Minions and Compositions will change acc: Minions and Compositions will change according with your current tavern tier and turn
Average placements within one standard d: Average placements within one standard deviation of the strongest hero
Average placements within one standard deviation below 4.5
Average placements more than one standar: Average placements more than one standard deviation below 4.5
Each bar represents a final placement fr: Each bar represents a final placement from 1st to 8th and how often this hero finishes a game at that placement.
The initial turns are indicated by the a: The initial turns are indicated by the amount of gold available at the start of each turn.
Turns after reaching 10 gold are indicat: Turns after reaching 10 gold are indicated by "+1", "+2", etc.
None of the winning players use their He: None of the winning players use their Hero Power on turn 1. That means it's probably a bad idea to do so.
At turn 5 (indicated by 8 gold), 80% of: At turn 5 (indicated by 8 gold), 80% of winning players use their Hero Power. That means it's probably a good idea to do so.
Have you ever wondered whether when you: Have you ever wondered whether when you should start or stop using your Hero Power? This chart shows what turn winning players use their Hero Power on.
The live version of this chart uses data: The live version of this chart uses data updated every few hours based on uploaded player data
Pack Leader gets purchased 57.4% of the: Pack Leader gets purchased 57.4% of the time by winning players, playing Beasts as Patchwerk on Tier 3, Turn 7.
Pack Leader participates in the combat r: Pack Leader participates in the combat round 82.1% of the time for winning players, playing Beasts as Patchwerk on Tier 3, Turn 7.
Winning players, playing Beasts as Patch: Winning players, playing Beasts as Patchwerk on Tier 3, Turn 7 mostly usually position Pack Leader far to the right.
Winning players, playing Beasts as Patchwerk on Tier 3, Turn 7 have a golden copy of Pack Leader 31.5% of the time.
Selling this minion when playing Beasts: Selling this minion when playing Beasts as Patchwerk on Tier 3, Turn 7 is good, if the minion is not golden.
Winning players, playing Beasts as Patch: Winning players, playing Beasts as Patchwerk on Tier 3, Turn 7 give Pack Leader taunt 0.1% of the time. Its probably not a good idea.
Minions with targetable battlecries show: Minions with targetable battlecries show information about selling and taunting with the their popular targets, as they are always always only used for their effect and sold frequently.
Winning players, playing Beasts as Patch: Winning players, playing Beasts as Patchwerk on Tier 3, Turn 7 target Cave Hydra 60% of the time when playing Hound Master.
Have you ever wondered which minions to: Have you ever wondered which minions to buy, sell or where to place them on the board? Of course you have, thats what this entire game mode is about! And we have the answers for you.
This is the Tavern Tier selector. Tier 2: This is the Tavern Tier selector. Tier 2 is currently active.
Within a Tavern Tier you can select a sp: Within a Tavern Tier you can select a specific turn (represented by the starting for each turn) for even more detailed results.
Unsure when to tavern up? Here you can s: Unsure when to tavern up? Here you can see the that most players spend 4 gold to tavern up to Tier 3.
This is the control panel used to change: This is the control panel used to change the active Tavern Tier and Turn. Changing these updates the minion list to show data for the specified Tavern Tier and Turn.
Changing these updates the minion list t: Changing these updates the minion list to show data for the specified Tavern Tier and Turn
Most players are on Tavern Tier 2 from t: Most players are on Tavern Tier 2 from turn 2 (indicated by 4 gold) to turn 4 (indicated by 6 gold).
100% of players are at tier 1 for the fi: 100% of players are at tier 1 for the first turn.
87% of players upgraded to Tavern Tier 2: 87% of players upgraded to Tavern Tier 2 on turn 2.
At 10 gold, most players are at Tavern T: At 10 gold, most players are at Tavern Tier 4, but 10% already upgraded to Tier 5.
At turn 14 (indicated by +6) most player: At turn 14 (indicated by +6) most players are at Tavern Tier 5, but 10% of players are still at Tavern Tier 4.
Have you ever wondered whether you’re ta: Have you ever wondered whether you’re taverning up too soon or waiting too long? This chart shows what tier the majority of winning players were at by the end of a given turn.
This card is not being played in any pop: This card is not being played in any popular deck in this game mode right now.

Analyzing millions of replays each month requires a lot of server power. If you're getting value from HSReplay.net, then please consider supporting the site by subscribing to Premium! By removing this account, you will no lo: 移除這個帳號將會使你再也不能存取他的統計數據。要恢復的話，用那個帳戶上傳一些重播吧。
移除爐石帳號時發生了錯誤。
You are currently on an HSReplay.net Pre: 你現在已經是HSReplay.net的尊榮訂閱會員。你不能在訂閱期間刪除你的帳號。請先<2>取消訂閱</2>。<5></5>請務必了解，您依然可以在取消後免費使用我們的網站，您沒有刪除帳號的必要。
We're sorry to see you go. You can reach: 我們很遺憾您的離開。您可以透過我們的電子郵件<0>{emailAddress}</0>、<1></1>Discord或是Twitter<2>{twitterHandle}</2>來聯繫我們。
<0>Deleting your account will:</0><1><0>: <0>刪除你的帳戶將會:</0><1><0>刪除所有網站上的個人資訊</0><1>取消綁定你的暴雪、Discord、Twitter帳戶</1><2>取消綁定任何跟HSReplay.net連動的程式(例如計牌器)。</2></1>
<0>Deleting your account <1>will not</1>: <0>刪除你的帳戶<1>將不會</1>:</0><1><0>重設你的統計。對局統計是由整個玩家群體所計算的。</0><1>刪除你的重播。如果你想刪除你的重播，你可以<2>在這裡完成</2>。</1><2>刪除任何帳單資訊，或是任何依法規規定我們有義務保留的數據。</2></1>
Please <0>contact us</0>, we can help yo: 請<0>聯繫我們</0>，我們可以幫你合併帳戶!
HSReplay.net is entirely usable for free: HSReplay.net 是免費的! 雖然尊榮會員是這個網站經營下去的基礎，但是你不一定要購買才能使用。
<0>Wait!</0> Deleting your account will: <0>等等!</0>刪除你的帳戶並不會重設你的統計數據。因為統計數據是由全球的玩家群體來計算而成的。<2></2>如果你想要刪除你的重播，你可以直接在<5>這裡</5>這樣做。
